column4: im gonna throw my problem out here into the room, and if anybody can solve it... i'll fkn worship you. hahha. I have around 4 native linux games, and with all of them.... about 10 mins into gameplay, they minimise to a small window and then i can't do anything anymore. anybody know a fix for this?
nobody got a solution to my problem? j:9
well, games is one of those areas where distributions need improvement
